import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-invoice', templateUrl: './invoice.component.html', styleUrls: ['./invoice.component.css'] }) export class InvoiceComponent { email="" list: any[]=[] constructor(private http: HttpClient,private router:Router) {} ngOnInit(): void { const user=localStorage.getItem('user') // if(user !== null){ // this.email =JSON.parse(user) // } const data1 = {data:{email:user}} const response = this.http.post("http://localhost:3000/order/getOrders",data1, { observe: 'response' }); response.subscribe(response=>{ const body=response.body console.log('response',response.body) // this.list=Array.isArray(response.body.data) ? response.body.data : [response.body.data] // console.log(this.list) }); } }
